title: Legit got flamed for joining the spectacular club.
body:
Decided to play a few ARURF games yesterday aaaaaannnnnddd boy was i wrong to do that.

got flamed in 4 games literally for having the symbol so well i tried to find out why everyone was so toxic and wow man... people just do not like the answer...

So is this 2019 league's meme? can't spend money anymore when you have it to waste (even thought its only $10)... come on people grow up a little :/

replies.body: Meanwhile they are probably popping outside for a cigarette every couple of games. At least your "wasteful" purchase isn't killing you.

Keep in mind, when you skin boost it forces those people onto whatever shitty skin they got. Also 10 dollars for a temporary thing is not work it, at all. You don't get anything permanent from it, so it's a complete waste. Maybe you're rich, but it's still a waste.

It doesn't carry over to the next ARURF, unless that was changed to be more reasonable.
To me it was only $10 for the vayne skin... paying money to anything is not worth it when it comes to games.
